name: Convergence Brief (Single-Page Source of Truth)
problem_pattern: Engagement starts underspecified; stakeholders differ on goals, constraints, and non-goals.
execution_intent: Create a Convergence Brief (Semantic Blueprint) capturing: Goal (success criteria), Roles (human vs agent responsibilities), Capabilities (agents/tools needed), Constraints (binding requirements), Non-goals (explicit out-of-scope), plus risks, open questions, and next decisions.
trigger_signals: new engagement | conflicting asks | paid commitment | rebrand messaging risk
success_conditions: {"execution": "Brief published and accepted as the current baseline.", "outcome": "Fewer scope re-litigations; faster decision velocity.", "safety_quality": "Non-goals prevent accidental commitments."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["scope creep via untracked asks"], "loud": ["stakeholder disagreement"], "clustered": ["multi-team engagements with unclear owner"]}

name: Stakeholder Map + RACI-lite
problem_pattern: Decisions are slow or blocked because ownership and approval paths are unclear.
execution_intent: Map deciders/influencers/approvers; define RACI-lite for key artifacts and escalation path.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Owners assigned to every key decision/artifact.", "outcome": "Approvals speed up; fewer surprises.", "safety_quality": "Escalation path prevents deadlock."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["implicit approvers appear late"], "loud": ["stakeholder refuses scope"], "clustered": ["regulated/enterprise customers"]}

name: Decision Log + One-Way Door Registry
problem_pattern: Half-decisions and hidden commitments accumulate under pressure.
execution_intent: Maintain decisions.md: decisions, reversibility, rationale, rejected alternatives, escalation status.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Every irreversible decision is explicitly flagged and referenced.", "outcome": "System is restartable/handoff-safe.", "safety_quality": "Prevents silent one-way door drift."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["decisions made in chat but not recorded"], "loud": ["contradictory decisions"], "clustered": ["fast-moving prototypes"]}

name: Problem → Workstream Decomposition (Non-Commit)
problem_pattern: Need expansive decomposition without committing to a plan.
execution_intent: Generate broad candidate workstreams + RIUs (non-commit). Human confirms active subset in decisions.md.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Candidate set is broad & understandable; no silent narrowing.", "outcome": "Human can select/decline quickly.", "safety_quality": "Gaps surfaced explicitly."}

name: Scope Freeze + Phased Delivery Contract
problem_pattern: Customer expects fast delivery; scope must be bounded into phases.
execution_intent: Define Phase 0/1/2 deliverables with acceptance criteria and rollback expectations.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Phase 0 delivers value quickly; Phase 1 bounded; Phase 2 optional.", "outcome": "Expectations align; fewer surprises.", "safety_quality": "No external commitments without one-way door sign-off."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["phase creep"], "loud": ["customer rejects phased approach"], "clustered": ["paid but missing requirements"]}

name: Success Metrics Charter
problem_pattern: Undefined success leads to churn and rework.
execution_intent: Define outcome metrics + leading indicators + acceptance checks; align with stakeholders.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Metrics charter agreed.", "outcome": "Faster acceptance decisions.", "safety_quality": "Prevents scope ambiguity."}

name: Constraint Profile Capture
problem_pattern: Hidden constraints (latency, compliance, budget) break design late.
execution_intent: Capture constraint profile; rank fixed vs negotiable constraints; record in decisions.md.
trigger_signals: security asks | latency SLA | budget cap
success_conditions: {"execution": "Constraints explicit and prioritized.", "outcome": "Design choices become faster.", "safety_quality": "Avoids late surprises."}

name: Assumptions Register
problem_pattern: Work proceeds on assumptions; they must be explicit and testable.
execution_intent: Record assumptions with validation plan and expiry; escalate if assumption implies a one-way door.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Assumptions visible and testable.", "outcome": "Wrong assumptions detected early.", "safety_quality": "Reduces hidden debt."}

name: Risk Register + Mitigation Plan
problem_pattern: Delivery risks need containment and owner assignment.
execution_intent: Maintain risk register with mitigations, owners, and triggers; update on cadence.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Risks have owners and mitigations.", "outcome": "Fewer surprises.", "safety_quality": "Escalation is timely."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["risks not revisited"], "loud": ["risk realized without plan"], "clustered": ["tight timelines"]}

name: Access & Permissions Readiness Checklist
problem_pattern: Blocked delivery due to missing credentials, network access, or unclear data movement constraints.
execution_intent: Produce least-privilege access checklist and smoke tests for read/write boundaries.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Required access provisioned + tested.", "outcome": "No access-related schedule slips.", "safety_quality": "Least-privilege and audit expectations explicit."}

name: Data Contract Freeze (Schemas + Samples)
problem_pattern: Shifting schemas across sources cause downstream rework.
execution_intent: Freeze versioned data contract: schemas, sample payloads, constraints, validation rules.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Contract validates against representative samples.", "outcome": "Integration unblocked; fewer misunderstandings.", "safety_quality": "PII handling recorded where relevant."}

name: PII/Compliance Triage (Controls Plan)
problem_pattern: Regulated data or compliance requirements constrain design and tooling.
execution_intent: Classify sensitivity, define minimization/redaction, document audit logging requirements.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Controls explicit; safe processing allowlist defined.", "outcome": "Compliance review path clear.", "safety_quality": "No disallowed fields processed."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["PII in logs"], "loud": ["policy conflict discovered late"], "clustered": ["HIPAA/PCI/GDPR customers"]}

name: Source-of-Truth Inventory (Systems + Owners)
problem_pattern: Multiple systems exist; unclear which is authoritative for each datum.
execution_intent: Create source-of-truth map listing systems, owners, fields, cadence, trust.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Each key field has an authoritative owner/system.", "outcome": "Integration ambiguity reduced.", "safety_quality": "Supports drift detection."}

name: Data Sampling + Edge-Case Catalog
problem_pattern: Data fails in reality due to edge cases.
execution_intent: Collect representative samples; catalog edge cases; convert into tests.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Edge cases enumerated and testable.", "outcome": "Fewer surprises during implementation.", "safety_quality": "Improves eval harness quality."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["rare encodings break parsing"], "loud": ["missing access to raw data"], "clustered": ["internationalization/multilingual"]}

name: Contract for Outputs (API/Events/Files)
problem_pattern: Downstream consumers need stable outputs; unclear payload/SLA/semantics.
execution_intent: Define output contract: schema, semantics, idempotency, SLAs, versioning.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Consumers integrate without rework.", "outcome": "Versioning/compatibility explicit.", "safety_quality": "One-way doors flagged pre-commitment."}

name: API Contract Review + Versioning Plan
problem_pattern: API changes break customers.
execution_intent: Review API contract; define compatibility + versioning rules.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Compatibility rules explicit.", "outcome": "Customers protected from breaking changes.", "safety_quality": "Safe evolution path."}

name: Connector Spec (Source/Target)
problem_pattern: Need to build/configure a connector reliably.
execution_intent: Define connector spec: auth, pagination, rate limits, retries, mapping, error handling.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Connector works end-to-end with retries.", "outcome": "Mapping deterministic.", "safety_quality": "Ops expectations explicit."}

name: Schema Mapping Table (Source→Target)
problem_pattern: Field mapping causes endless churn.
execution_intent: Create mapping table with transforms/defaults/provenance; validate with samples.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Mappings agreed and testable.", "outcome": "Fewer mapping bugs.", "safety_quality": "Supports auditability."}

name: Data Lineage Sketch (Minimal)
problem_pattern: Need to understand data movement and dependencies.
execution_intent: Produce minimal lineage diagram + narrative: source→processing→sink, including owners.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Shared understanding of data flow.", "outcome": "Reduces compliance/ops surprises.", "safety_quality": "Improves debugging speed."}

name: Baseline Behavior Snapshot (Before Changes)
problem_pattern: Baseline is unknown; risk of regressions.
execution_intent: Capture baseline outputs + metrics for representative cases; store as golden artifacts.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Baseline reproducible; improvements measurable.", "outcome": "Regression risk reduced.", "safety_quality": "Supports rollback decisions."}

name: Golden Set + Offline Evaluation Harness
problem_pattern: Quality needs measurement without perfect telemetry.
execution_intent: Build golden cases, expected doc families, and offline metrics runner.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Changes gated by offline eval.", "outcome": "Quality improvements measurable.", "safety_quality": "Prevents 'feels better' shipping."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["golden set too narrow"], "loud": ["no ground truth agreement"], "clustered": ["subjective outputs"]}

name: Prompt Interface Contract (Inputs/Outputs)
problem_pattern: Prompting drifts; unclear variables and output format.
execution_intent: Define prompt interface: variables, constraints, required schema, failure handling.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Prompts composable + versionable.", "outcome": "Outputs parse reliably.", "safety_quality": "Reduces brittle prompt drift."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["schema not enforced"], "loud": ["model changes break format"], "clustered": ["long-context prompts"]}

name: Deterministic-First Pipeline Split
problem_pattern: LLM used where deterministic logic would be safer; need containment.
execution_intent: Split pipeline into deterministic and LLM stages; add guards + fallbacks.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Most failures become loud and diagnosable.", "outcome": "Reduced hallucination surface.", "safety_quality": "Fallbacks maintain usability."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["LLM used without evidence tags"], "loud": ["fallback not triggered"], "clustered": ["edge-case inputs"]}

name: Sidecar Augmentation (Read-Only Intelligence Artifacts)
problem_pattern: Augment an existing system without rewriting it.
execution_intent: Generate adjacent sidecar artifacts keyed by doc_id/entity_id with computed signals + reason codes.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Augmentation works without touching source system.", "outcome": "Rollback = ignore sidecars.", "safety_quality": "Sidecars idempotent + versioned."}

name: Freshness/Staleness Rules (Deterministic)
problem_pattern: Recommendations are stale; ingestion lag exists; removals are silent.
execution_intent: Implement freshness classes + downrank/omit rules; orphan detection via last-seen snapshots.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Stale outputs reduced; behavior predictable.", "outcome": "Orphans never surfaced.", "safety_quality": "Staleness cases covered in eval."}

name: Hybrid Similarity (Enums + Embeddings)
problem_pattern: Need 'seen this before' exemplars for faster operator reasoning.
execution_intent: Return neighbors using hybrid similarity + reason codes; avoid LLM prose by default.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Operators find precedents faster.", "outcome": "Neighbors explainable via reason codes.", "safety_quality": "Stable under no-change conditions."}

name: Reranking Layer (Post-Retrieval)
problem_pattern: Baseline retrieval exists; need better ordering without changing index.
execution_intent: Apply reranking using deterministic signals + optional model scoring; include explanations.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Top-k relevance improves measurably.", "outcome": "Explanations cite signals.", "safety_quality": "Rollback = disable reranker."}

name: Schema-Constrained Generation
problem_pattern: Outputs must be machine-usable; free-form text breaks downstream.
execution_intent: Enforce JSON schema outputs with validation, retries, and partial repair.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Parse errors drop significantly.", "outcome": "Failures become loud/recoverable.", "safety_quality": "Supports deterministic downstream."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["accepting partial invalid JSON"], "loud": ["schema too strict"], "clustered": ["nested objects"]}

name: Tool-Calling Safety Envelope
problem_pattern: Agents can call tools; must limit blast radius and enforce permissions.
execution_intent: Define tool allowlist, rate limits, redaction, and audit requirements.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Tool calls bounded and auditable.", "outcome": "No sensitive data leakage.", "safety_quality": "Safe-by-default execution."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["tool called with unsafe args"], "loud": ["missing audit logs"], "clustered": ["high concurrency"]}

name: Extraction Pattern (Structured from Unstructured)
problem_pattern: Need reliable extraction of fields from text/docs.
execution_intent: Implement extraction with schema constraints, confidence, and fallbacks; produce eval set.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Structured fields extracted reliably.", "outcome": "Error cases visible.", "safety_quality": "Extraction measurable."}

name: Classification Pattern (Soft Labels)
problem_pattern: Need labels for narrowing/analytics without overfitting.
execution_intent: Implement soft classification with confidence + abstain; log uncertainty.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Labels useful without forced certainty.", "outcome": "Abstentions guide discovery.", "safety_quality": "Supports clustering."}

name: Ranking Explanation Rules (Reason Codes)
problem_pattern: Need explainability without LLM fluff.
execution_intent: Define deterministic reason codes and attach to ranked outputs.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Recommendations explainable.", "outcome": "Ranking changes debug-friendly.", "safety_quality": "Trust improves."}

name: Caching Strategy + Invalidation Plan
problem_pattern: Latency/cost too high; caching needed; risk of staleness.
execution_intent: Define caching layers, TTLs, invalidation triggers, and tradeoffs.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Latency/cost reduced measurably.", "outcome": "Staleness controlled and explicit.", "safety_quality": "Cache failures diagnosable."}

name: Deployment Readiness Envelope (Anchor)
problem_pattern: Deployment readiness unknown; risk of environment surprises.
execution_intent: Define deployment envelope: envs, configs, secrets, migrations, rollback, release gates.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Requirements for safe deploy across envs.", "outcome": "Rollback/gates defined before launch.", "safety_quality": "Reduces environment drift."}

name: Observability Baseline (Anchor)
problem_pattern: System not observable; failures will be silent.
execution_intent: Define minimum observability: logs, metrics, traces, dashboards, alerts, and ownership.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Key flows measurable; alerts fire on bad states.", "outcome": "Debugging is faster.", "safety_quality": "Prevents silent degradation."}

name: Incident Containment & Recovery Plan (Anchor)
problem_pattern: Need containment, rollback, comms, ownership before incidents happen.
execution_intent: Create incident runbook with kill switches, rollback, comms templates, escalation owners.
workstreams: Ops & Delivery | Adoption & Change | Quality & Safety
success_conditions: {"execution": "Incidents handled predictably with minimal downtime.", "outcome": "Comms are clear/timely.", "safety_quality": "No uncontrolled changes during recovery."}

name: Performance & Load Characterization (Anchor)
problem_pattern: Performance unknown; risk of SLA failure after commitments.
execution_intent: Define performance envelope, load tests, bottleneck analysis, scaling assumptions.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Latency/throughput measured under realistic loads.", "outcome": "Scaling assumptions documented.", "safety_quality": "Prevents premature SLA commitments."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["tests not representative"], "loud": ["timeouts under load"], "clustered": ["cold starts / cache warmups"]}

name: Feature Flags + Kill Switch Integration
problem_pattern: Need safe rollout and instant rollback without redeploy.
execution_intent: Implement feature flags for risky paths and a kill switch for critical flows.
success_conditions: {"execution": "New behavior can be disabled instantly.", "outcome": "Rollouts staged safely.", "safety_quality": "Incidents contained quickly."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["flags not wired to real code paths"], "loud": ["flag state inconsistent"], "clustered": ["multi-service systems"]}

name: Config Management + Environment Parity
problem_pattern: Works in one env but fails in another; configs diverge.
execution_intent: Centralize configs; define env parity checks; document differences explicitly.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Environment drift detected early.", "outcome": "Deploys reproduce local behavior.", "safety_quality": "Less 'works on staging'."}

name: Secrets Handling + Rotation Expectations
problem_pattern: Secrets needed; risk leakage or rotation breakage.
execution_intent: Define secrets storage, access, rotation, and smoke tests.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Secrets managed safely and rotate without downtime.", "outcome": "No secrets in logs/repos.", "safety_quality": "Clear operational ownership."}

name: Database Migration Safety Wrapper
problem_pattern: Schema changes are one-way doors and can cause outages.
execution_intent: Stage migrations with backfill strategy, compat matrix, and rollback path.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Migrations reversible or safely staged.", "outcome": "No downtime surprises.", "safety_quality": "Backfills monitored."}

name: Canary Rollout + Error Budget Gate
problem_pattern: Need to ship while learning safely from real traffic.
execution_intent: Implement canary with error budget gates and objective rollback criteria.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Risk limited to small cohort.", "outcome": "Rollback triggers objective.", "safety_quality": "Learning happens safely."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["cohort not representative"], "loud": ["false rollback"], "clustered": ["traffic skew by region"]}

name: Runbook (Day-2 Operations)
problem_pattern: Solution works but cannot be operated.
execution_intent: Write runbook: deploy, rollback, troubleshooting, on-call actions, known issues.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Ops can run system without builder.", "outcome": "Incidents resolved faster.", "safety_quality": "Support load reduced."}

name: SLO/SLI Definition + Alert Thresholds
problem_pattern: Need reliability targets without overpromising.
execution_intent: Define SLIs/SLOs and alert thresholds tied to error budgets.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Reliability targets explicit.", "outcome": "Alerts tied to user impact.", "safety_quality": "Avoid accidental SLA promises."}

name: Contract Tests (Input/Output)
problem_pattern: Interfaces drift; downstream breaks without loud failures.
execution_intent: Implement contract tests with fixtures and CI enforcement.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Breaking changes caught pre-deploy.", "outcome": "Interfaces stable.", "safety_quality": "Failures loud."}

name: End-to-End Smoke Tests (Critical Path)
problem_pattern: Need confidence that critical path works in prod-like conditions.
execution_intent: Create minimal e2e smoke tests and run pre/post deploy.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Critical failures detected quickly.", "outcome": "Deploy confidence increases.", "safety_quality": "Runbook usable by on-call."}

name: LLM Safety Guardrails (Content + Tool Use)
problem_pattern: LLM outputs can hallucinate or violate constraints.
execution_intent: Define policy constraints, evidence requirements, refusal rules, and tool bounds; enforce via validators.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Unsafe outputs blocked/downgraded.", "outcome": "Tool calls constrained.", "safety_quality": "Compliance auditable."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["guards not enforced everywhere"], "loud": ["over-refusal harms usability"], "clustered": ["prompt injection"]}

name: Red Team Scenarios (Abuse + Failure)
problem_pattern: System may be abused or fail dangerously under adversarial inputs.
execution_intent: Define red-team scenarios and run as pre-launch gate; document mitigations.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Abuse cases tested; mitigations documented.", "outcome": "High-risk behaviors detected early.", "safety_quality": "Launch risk reduced."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["scenario set incomplete"], "loud": ["false sense of security"], "clustered": ["adversarial prompts"]}

name: Data Quality Checks (Nulls, Duplicates, Ranges)
problem_pattern: Bad data silently degrades outcomes.
execution_intent: Add data quality checks and thresholds; surface anomalies loudly or as warnings.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Bad data detected before downstream impact.", "outcome": "Anomalies visible to operators.", "safety_quality": "Prevents silent degradation."}

name: Cost/Latency Budget Envelope
problem_pattern: Costs/latency can blow up unexpectedly.
execution_intent: Define cost/latency budgets; implement guards and alerts with fallbacks.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Costs/latency stay within bounded envelope.", "outcome": "Spikes trigger alerts and fallback.", "safety_quality": "Prevents runaway spend."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["budget not enforced"], "loud": ["budget triggers too often"], "clustered": ["burst traffic"]}

name: Regression Suite (Golden + Metamorphic)
problem_pattern: Need regressions caught beyond a small golden set.
execution_intent: Add metamorphic tests and invariants alongside golden cases.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Regressions caught even when golden set incomplete.", "outcome": "Confidence improves.", "safety_quality": "Safer shipping cadence."}

name: Human Review Gate (One-Way Doors)
problem_pattern: Irreversible decisions need explicit gating.
execution_intent: Define review checklist for one-way doors; require sign-off recorded in decisions.md.
success_conditions: {"execution": "No one-way door executed without sign-off.", "outcome": "Audit trail exists.", "safety_quality": "Reduces catastrophic mistakes."}

name: Privacy Redaction Pipeline
problem_pattern: Logs/prompts may include sensitive info.
execution_intent: Implement redaction/minimization for logs/prompts/stored artifacts; verify with tests.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Sensitive fields never stored or logged.", "outcome": "Compliance risk reduced.", "safety_quality": "Safe handling documented."}

name: No-Lie Capability Statement (Internal + External Safe)
problem_pattern: Messaging risk during rebrand; customers paid; scope ambiguous.
execution_intent: Write capability statement: what exists, what is pilot, what is out-of-scope, assumptions.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Messaging consistent without overpromising.", "outcome": "Customers understand boundaries.", "safety_quality": "Commitments tracked as one-way doors."}

name: Customer Workshop (Problem Framing + RIU Mapping)
problem_pattern: Customer needs alignment; asks are broad.
execution_intent: Facilitate workshop to converge on JTBD and map to multiple candidate RIUs (non-commit).
success_conditions: {"execution": "Aligned scope and prioritized plan.", "outcome": "Customer understands phases/tradeoffs.", "safety_quality": "Gaps surfaced explicitly."}

name: Enablement Pack (Docs + Demos + Runbooks)
problem_pattern: Adoption fails due to missing docs/demos/runbooks.
execution_intent: Create enablement pack: quickstart, demo script, FAQ, runbook, handoff checklist.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Customer operates solution without FDE presence.", "outcome": "Support load reduced.", "safety_quality": "Handoff is safe."}

name: Training Session + Feedback Capture
problem_pattern: Users need training; unknown friction points.
execution_intent: Deliver training and capture structured feedback to refine assumptions/RIU candidates.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Users operate system independently.", "outcome": "Feedback yields actionable improvements.", "safety_quality": "Repeat questions drop."}

name: Handoff Bundle (Restartable Engagement Package)
problem_pattern: Need to hand off or restart without hidden state.
execution_intent: Package core+assumptions+decisions+artifacts with README and artifact index.
success_conditions: {"execution": "New operator resumes quickly.", "outcome": "No critical knowledge lost.", "safety_quality": "Restart requires no external memory."}

name: Executive Update (Clarity Under Pressure)
problem_pattern: Executives need crisp updates; misalignment risk.
execution_intent: Produce update: progress, risks, decisions needed, next demo.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Leadership unblocks decisions quickly.", "outcome": "Risks visible.", "safety_quality": "Trust maintained."}

name: Integration Mode Selection (API vs Webhook vs Batch)
problem_pattern: Need to connect systems; best integration mode unclear.
execution_intent: Compare integration modes with SLAs, latency, ops cost, failure modes; record decision.
workstreams: Interfaces & Inputs | Ops & Delivery | Clarify & Bound
success_conditions: {"execution": "Integration mode selected with explicit tradeoffs.", "outcome": "Expectations align.", "safety_quality": "Avoid hidden one-way doors."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["mode chosen by habit"], "loud": ["customer requires different mode"], "clustered": ["high-volume streams"]}

name: Webhook Reliability Pattern (Retries + Idempotency)
problem_pattern: Webhooks fail under retries/duplicates; consumers break.
execution_intent: Implement retry policy, idempotency keys, signature verification, replay handling.
success_conditions: {"execution": "At-least-once delivery safe; duplicates handled.", "outcome": "Retries do not overload systems.", "safety_quality": "Security verified."}

name: Batch Pipeline Safety Pattern (Checkpointing)
problem_pattern: Batch jobs fail mid-run; partial results corrupt downstream.
execution_intent: Add checkpointing/resumability; define rerun semantics and idempotent writes.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Batch reruns are safe and predictable.", "outcome": "Partial failures recover cleanly.", "safety_quality": "Operational burden reduced."}

name: Queue + Backpressure Pattern
problem_pattern: Producer/consumer mismatch causes overload and cascades.
execution_intent: Introduce queueing, backpressure, rate limits, dead-letter handling.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Stability under spikes.", "outcome": "Failures isolated to DLQ.", "safety_quality": "Backpressure prevents cascades."}

name: Research Sweep: FDE Role Patterns (External)
problem_pattern: Need external signal to detect missing RIUs and emerging patterns.
execution_intent: Collect patterns from public FDE job descriptions, case studies, delivery writeups; propose candidate gaps.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Candidate gaps suggested with evidence.", "outcome": "Workstreams refined from observed reality.", "safety_quality": "No auto-promotion occurs."}

name: Candidate RIU Template + Tight Bounding
problem_pattern: No RIU fits a problem; need bounded candidate material.
execution_intent: Create Candidate RIU with explicit pattern/intent/artifacts/success/failure/deps; delete quickly if it fails.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Gap becomes explicit and testable.", "outcome": "Candidate safe to try and cheap to delete.", "safety_quality": "No accidental canonization."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["candidate too broad"], "loud": ["candidate overlaps existing RIUs"], "clustered": ["new product launches"]}

name: Customer Problem Narrative (JTBD + Constraints)
problem_pattern: Customer describes symptoms, not root cause; narrative fragmented.
execution_intent: Synthesize a JTBD narrative and symptom map from notes; confirm with customer.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Narrative confirmed.", "outcome": "Less misinterpretation.", "safety_quality": "Better decomposition."}

name: Competitive/Alternatives Scan (Non-Sales)
problem_pattern: Customer compares vendors; need technical differentiation without hype.
execution_intent: Summarize alternatives with tradeoffs, risks, and integration costs.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Customer can choose with clarity.", "outcome": "Reduces rework from wrong assumptions.", "safety_quality": "Avoids overpromising."}

name: Escalation Trigger Definition
problem_pattern: Escalations happen randomly; teams surprised.
execution_intent: Define triggers for escalation (security, SLA, data) and owners.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Escalations predictable.", "outcome": "Less surprise blocking.", "safety_quality": "Faster approvals."}

name: Data Ingestion Mode Decision (Pull vs Push)
problem_pattern: Unclear whether to pull data or receive pushes; impacts ops cost.
execution_intent: Decide pull vs push; record tradeoffs and failure modes.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Mode selected with explicit tradeoffs.", "outcome": "Ops cost understood.", "safety_quality": "Avoid hidden one-way doors."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["choice made implicitly"], "loud": ["mode conflicts with infra"], "clustered": ["high volume data"]}

name: Rate Limit & Quota Discovery
problem_pattern: APIs throttle unexpectedly; integration breaks.
execution_intent: Measure and document rate limits, quotas, retry headers, and backoff strategies.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Integration respects quotas.", "outcome": "Avoid bans/outages.", "safety_quality": "Predictable throughput."}

name: File Format Handling (CSV/JSON/Parquet)
problem_pattern: Customer uses inconsistent file formats and encodings.
execution_intent: Define supported formats/encodings; implement validators and conversion tools.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Formats handled reliably.", "outcome": "Edge-case files fail loudly.", "safety_quality": "Support burden reduced."}

name: Retrieval Query Rewriting (Guarded)
problem_pattern: User queries are vague; retrieval recall low.
execution_intent: Implement query rewriting with constraints and abstain; evaluate on golden set.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Recall improves measurably.", "outcome": "No harmful rewrites.", "safety_quality": "Abstain prevents damage."}

name: Chunking Strategy for Long Docs
problem_pattern: Long docs cause retrieval misses; chunking unclear.
execution_intent: Define chunking strategy and evaluate retrieval impact.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Retrieval improves for long docs.", "outcome": "Chunk boundaries reasonable.", "safety_quality": "Latency/cost controlled."}

name: Deduplication at Retrieval Time
problem_pattern: Near-duplicate docs dominate results; diversity poor.
execution_intent: Implement dedup in results; preserve diversity with reason codes.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Results more diverse; less redundancy.", "outcome": "User satisfaction improves.", "safety_quality": "Explainable pruning."}
failure_modes: {"silent": ["dedup removes key variant"], "loud": ["dedup too aggressive"], "clustered": ["templated docs"]}

name: Security Review Packet (Minimal)
problem_pattern: Security team needs evidence to approve.
execution_intent: Assemble packet: threat model, data flows, permissions, mitigations, tests.
success_conditions: {"execution": "Security review faster.", "outcome": "Risks explicit.", "safety_quality": "Mitigations verified."}
